episode_event_card_collab/4001_1001_0100:
Pasio Pokémon battle basics! The first thing you
should know is they’re three-on-three team
battles!
episode_event_card_collab/4001_1001_0200:
So if you want to battle, you need three sync pairs
to form a team!
episode_event_card_collab/4001_1001_0300:
The trick is to understand who’s good at what—
and to put together a balanced team!
episode_event_card_collab/4001_1001_0400: And! So! This is how it’s gonna go down!
episode_event_card_collab/4001_1001_0500:
First things firstly! For your big Pasio Pokémon
battle debut, we’re gonna have you team up
with US!
episode_event_card_collab/4001_1101_0600:
If you’re new to battling, focus on putting together
teams that have a strike, tech, and support
sync pair!
episode_event_card_collab/4001_1101_0700:
In this event, you can team up with one sync pair
per role and test them out in battle!
episode_event_card_collab/4002_1001_0100:
I’m first, so lemme explain my role! I’m a strike
sync pair!
episode_event_card_collab/4002_1001_0200:
Strike sync pairs are gonna be the hard-hitting
core of your offensive game!
episode_event_card_collab/4002_1001_0300:
We fly high like a Wattrel and hit ’em hard with
our attacks!
episode_event_card_collab/4002_1001_0400:
Buuuut...we’re also fragile when it comes to
defense... Oh noes...
episode_event_card_collab/4002_1001_0500:
That’s why you gotta get ANOTHER sync pair to
take those attacks for ya! Ya feel me?
episode_event_card_collab/4002_1001_0600:
Tactics—the order in which your opponents target
you—is gonna be your sweet key to victory!
File that piece of wisdom into your brainspace!
episode_event_card_collab/4003_1001_0100:
Next is me. I’ll be talking about support
sync pairs.
episode_event_card_collab/4003_1001_0200:
We’re good at strengthening allies and
restoring HP, among other things.
episode_event_card_collab/4003_1001_0300:
We know how to take a hit, so we’re well-suited
to being your opponents’ first target!
episode_event_card_collab/4003_1001_0400: Let me take the damage from their attacks!
episode_event_card_collab/4003_1001_0500:
We’re super solid—and shine bright as the center
of attention.
episode_event_card_collab/4003_1001_0600:
So in a way, I suppose our role is similar to a
gemstone’s!
episode_event_card_collab/4004_1001_0100:
Last but not least, let me tell you about tech
sync pairs.
episode_event_card_collab/4004_1001_0200:
We can do all sorts of things, like give opponents
status conditions or lower their stats!
episode_event_card_collab/4004_1001_0300:
So I guess we’ve a little somethin’ to cover
whatever the strike and support sync pairs can’t.
episode_event_card_collab/4004_1001_0400:
The tougher your opponents, the more you’ll
probably rely on pairs like us.
episode_event_card_collab/4004_1001_0500:
No matter how tough they are, though, don’t
give up! I’m cheerin’ for ya!
